title: Atticus: Secret Lies
description: Time stands still.Lies were told.Secrets are revealed.Who will we be when the walls tumble like mortar?**WARNING**The Adair Empire is a dark and graphic romance that will push your buttons, and maybe your boundaries. Each book contains a new couple but ends with a plot cliff-hanger. While Atticus can be read as a stand-alone within the series, it is suggested you start from the beginning.
author: K.L. Donn
